医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了女性在医疗保健领域面临的福祉挑战研究回顾了女性在医疗保健领域的福祉，强调了工作与生活平衡、职业自主权和支持性环境对她们心理健康和工作满意度的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Study-shines-light-on-the-well-being-challenges-faced-by-women-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Study-shines-light-on-the-well-being-challenges-faced-by-women-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9ca3cfc-9d21-4a35-a920-43b3641f9752 Sun, 25 Feb 2024 23:02:00 -0500 Study shines light on the well-being challenges faced by women in healthcare
研究发现，人工智能聊天机器人表现出类似人类的个性和决策特征PNAS 的一项研究根据人类基准评估了 AI 聊天机器人，结果表明 AI 表现出类似人类的行为和个性特征，其中 ChatGPT-4 密切反映了人类在战略决策和个性评估中的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/AI-chatbots-show- human-like-personality-and-decision-making-traits-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/AI-chatbots-show- human-like-personality-and-decision-making-traits-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0aa7ff60-ee70-4491-9229-afa6b4d2ecff Sun, 25 Feb 2024 22:51:00 -0500 AI chatbots show human-like personality and decision-making traits, study finds
SARS-CoV-2 感染和疫苗诱导的抗体最初减弱，但稳定下来以提供持久保护《Immunity》上发表的一项研究表明，针对 SARS-CoV-2 感染和疫苗接种的抗体反应是持久的，最初会下降，然后在七到九个月后稳定下来，这凸显了 mRNA 疫苗的有效性和混合免疫的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/SARS-CoV-2-infection-and-vaccine-induced-antibodies-wane-initially-but-stabilize-for- permanent-protection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/SARS-CoV-2-infection-and-vaccine-induced-antibodies-wane-initially-but-stabilize-for- permanent-protection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcfe4817-6aca-4b1a-b186-777f53a49eee Sun, 25 Feb 2024 22:32:00 -0500 SARS-CoV-2-infection and vaccine-induced antibodies wane initially but stabilize for lasting protection
八卦如何成为人类最古老的病毒趋势研究人员利用进化博弈论和基于主体的模型来证明八卦在声誉传播和自私威慑中的作用如何有助于其进化稳定性，这表明八卦将继续成为一种普遍的社会行为https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/How-gossip-became- humanitys-oldest-viral-trend.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/How-gossip-became- humanitys-oldest-viral-trend.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea3441af-ddf6-4698-893a-acc8a3acfe1a Sun, 25 Feb 2024 22:02:00 -0500 How gossip became humanity's oldest viral trend
研究表明超加工食品与肠道健康风险有关《自然评论胃肠病学和肝病学》中的一篇综述综合了超加工食品和食品添加剂对肠道健康的负面影响的证据，将它们与慢性疾病和肠道微生物组的改变联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Study-links-ultra-processed-foods-to-gut-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Study-links-ultra-processed-foods-to-gut-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fea96e5-0ab1-4dac-9bda-916f5e5146e7 Sun, 25 Feb 2024 21:38:00 -0500 Study links ultra-processed foods to gut health risks
怀孕期间的鱼油与儿童体重增加和代谢风险有关《美国临床营养学杂志》上的一项研究发现，怀孕期间补充鱼油与后代十岁时体重增加和代谢综合征的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Fish-oil-in-pregnancy-linked-to-child-weight-gain-and-metabolic-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Fish-oil-in-pregnancy-linked-to-child-weight-gain-and-metabolic-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25773bb5-d312-4f36-9dee-c5991d6a3747 Sun, 25 Feb 2024 19:29:00 -0500 Fish oil in pregnancy linked to child weight gain and metabolic risks
地中海饮食与老年女性抑郁风险降低有关《英国营养学杂志》的一项研究发现，坚持地中海饮食与抑郁症状呈负相关，尤其是老年女性，这凸显了这种饮食对心理健康的潜在益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-lower-depression-risk-in-older-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-lower-depression-risk-in-older-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=672ad892-a91c-4b5f-9d22-4b9dbefa9ed7 Sun, 25 Feb 2024 18:56:00 -0500 Mediterranean diet linked to lower depression risk in older women
新技术可以改变脑部疾病的治疗格局人脑对内部和外部变化的适应性（称为神经可塑性）构成了理解记忆和学习等认知功能以及各种神经系统疾病的基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Novel-technique-could-transform-the-treatment-landscape-for-brain-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Novel-technique-could-transform-the-treatment-landscape-for-brain-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91c454d1-18c0-4c36-beee-94bc730e5551 Sat, 24 Feb 2024 13:21:00 -0500 Novel technique could transform the treatment landscape for brain disorders
研究人员为患有罕见自身免疫性疾病 EGPA 的患者找到了新疗法包括来自麦克马斯特大学和汉密尔顿圣约瑟夫医疗保健中心的研究人员在内的一个国际团队已经为患有一种罕见的自身免疫性疾病（称为嗜酸性肉芽肿性多血管炎（EGPA））的患者找到了一种新的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Researchers-identify-new-therapeutic-for-病人-with-a-rare-autoimmune-disease-EGPA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Researchers-identify-new-therapeutic-for-病人-with-a-rare-autoimmune-disease-EGPA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eebfd644-d987-440f-a54d-af08dd5520ba Sat, 24 Feb 2024 13:14:00 -0500 Researchers identify new therapeutic for patients with a rare autoimmune disease EGPA
正念可以缓冲数字工作的阴暗面一项新的研究表明，在数字化工作场所中更加专注的员工能够更好地抵御压力、焦虑和超负荷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Mindativity-buffers-against-the-dark-side-of-digital-work.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Mindativity-buffers-against-the-dark-side-of-digital-work.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b773dcc2-549b-4684-9b71-17c262d937ae Sat, 24 Feb 2024 13:06:00 -0500 Mindfulness buffers against the dark side of digital work
